verses.verse: כִּי֩ <WH3588> For הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> behold הָאָד֜וֹן <WH113> For behold the Lord יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts מֵסִ֤יר <WH5493> doth take away מִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> from Jerusalem וּמִ֣יהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> and from Judah מַשְׁעֵ֖ן <WH4937> the stay וּמַשְׁעֵנָ֑ה <WH4938> and the staff כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> and the whole מִשְׁעַן־ <WH4937> the whole stay לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> of bread וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and the whole מִשְׁעַן־ <WH4937> stay מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> of water

גִּבּ֖וֹר <WH1368> The mighty man וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and the man מִלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> of war שׁוֹפֵ֥ט <WH8199> the judge וְנָבִ֖יא <WH5030> and the prophet וְקֹסֵ֥ם <WH7080> and the prudent וְזָקֵֽן׃ <WH2205> and the ancient

שַׂר־ <WH8269> The captain חֲמִשִּׁ֖ים <WH2572> of fifty וּנְשׂ֣וּא <WH5375> and the honourable פָנִ֑ים <WH6440> man וְיוֹעֵ֛ץ <WH3289> and the counsellor וַחֲכַ֥ם <WH2450> and the cunning חֲרָשִׁ֖ים <WH2798> Charashim וּנְב֥וֹן <WH995> and the eloquent לָֽחַשׁ׃ <WH3908> orator
וְנָתַתִּ֥י <WH5414> And I will give נְעָרִ֖ים <WH5288> children שָׂרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH8269> [to be] their princes וְתַעֲלוּלִ֖ים <WH8586> and babes יִמְשְׁלוּ־ <WH4910> shall rule בָֽם׃

וְנִגַּ֣שׂ <WH5065> shall be oppressed הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> And the people אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> by another וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and every one בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> by his neighbour יִרְהֲב֗וּ <WH7292> shall behave himself proudly הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> the child בַּזָּקֵ֔ן <WH2205> against the ancient וְהַנִּקְלֶ֖ה <WH7034> and the base בַּנִּכְבָּֽד׃ <WH3513> against the honourable

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִתְפֹּ֨שׂ <WH8610> shall take hold אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> When a man בְּאָחִיו֙ <WH251> of his brother בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house אָבִ֔יו <WH1> of his father שִׂמְלָ֣ה <WH8071> [saying] Thou hast clothing לְכָ֔ה <WH1980> you קָצִ֖ין <WH7101> be thou our ruler תִּֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֑נוּ וְהַמַּכְשֵׁלָ֥ה <WH4384> and [let] this ruin הַזֹּ֖את <WH2063> likewise תַּ֥חַת <WH8478> will be under יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> [be] under thy hand

יִשָּׂא֩ <WH5375> shall he swear בַיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֤וּא ׀ <WH1931> he לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying לֹא־ <WH3808> not אֶהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become חֹבֵ֔שׁ <WH2280> I will not be an healer וּבְבֵיתִ֕י <WH1004> for in my house אֵ֥ין <WH369> there לֶ֖חֶם <WH3899> [is] neither bread וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> is neither שִׂמְלָ֑ה <WH8071> nor clothing לֹ֥א <WH3808> should not תְשִׂימֻ֖נִי <WH7760> make קְצִ֥ין <WH7101> me not a ruler עָֽם׃ <WH5971> of the people

כִּ֤י <WH3588> Because כָשְׁלָה֙ <WH3782> is ruined יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> For Jerusalem וִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> and Judah נָפָ֑ל <WH5307> is fallen כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because לְשׁוֹנָ֤ם <WH3956> because their tongue וּמַֽעַלְלֵיהֶם֙ <WH4611> and their doings אֶל־ <WH413> are against יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> [are] against the LORD לַמְר֖וֹת <WH4784> to provoke עֵנֵ֥י <WH5869> the eyes כְבוֹדֽוֹ׃ <WH3519> of his glory

הַכָּרַ֤ת <WH1971> The shew פְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH6440> of their countenance עָ֣נְתָה <WH6030> doth witness against them בָּ֔ם וְחַטָּאתָ֛ם <WH2403> their sin כִּסְדֹ֥ם <WH5467> as Sodom הִגִּ֖ידוּ <WH5046> and they declare לֹ֣א <WH3808> do כִחֵ֑דוּ <WH3582> they hide א֣וֹי <WH188> [it] not Woe לְנַפְשָׁ֔ם <WH5315> unto their soul כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גָמְל֥וּ <WH1580> for they have rewarded לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> evil

אִמְר֥וּ <WH559> Say צַדִּ֖יק <WH6662> ye to the righteous כִּי־ <WH3588> that ט֑וֹב <WH2896> that [it shall be] well כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פְרִ֥י <WH6529> the fruit מַעַלְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4611> of their doings יֹאכֵֽלוּ׃ <WH398> [with him] for they shall eat

א֖וֹי <WH188> Woe לְרָשָׁ֣ע <WH7563> unto the wicked רָ֑ע <WH7451> [it shall be] ill כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גְמ֥וּל <WH1576> [with him] for the reward יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> of his hands יֵעָ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> shall be given לּֽוֹ׃

עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> [As for] my people נֹגְשָׂ֣יו <WH5065> [are] their oppressors מְעוֹלֵ֔ל <WH5768> babe וְנָשִׁ֖ים <WH802> and women מָ֣שְׁלוּ <WH4910> rule ב֑וֹ עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> over them O my people מְאַשְּׁרֶ֣יךָ <WH833> they which lead מַתְעִ֔ים <WH8582> thee cause [thee] to err וְדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> the way אֹֽרְחֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH734> of thy paths בִּלֵּֽעוּ׃ <WH1104> and destroy ס
נִצָּ֥ב <WH5324> standeth up לָרִ֖יב <WH7378> to plead יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> The LORD וְעֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> and standeth לָדִ֥ין <WH1777> to judge עַמִּֽים׃ <WH5971> the people

יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> The LORD בְּמִשְׁפָּ֣ט <WH4941> into judgment יָב֔וֹא <WH935> will enter עִם־ <WH5973> with זִקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> with the ancients עַמּ֖וֹ <WH5971> of his people וְשָׂרָ֑יו <WH8269> and the princes וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> who בִּֽעַרְתֶּ֣ם <WH1197> thereof for ye have eaten up הַכֶּ֔רֶם <WH3754> the vineyard גְּזֵלַ֥ת <WH1500> the spoil הֶֽעָנִ֖י <WH6041> of the poor בְּבָתֵּיכֶֽם׃ <WH1004> [is] in your houses

[מַלָּכֶם כ] (מַה־ לָּכֶם֙ <WH4480> at ק) תְּדַכְּא֣וּ <WH1792> to pieces עַמִּ֔י <WH5971> my people וּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> the faces עֲנִיִּ֖ים <WH6041> afflicted תִּטְחָ֑נוּ <WH2912> and grind נְאֻם־ <WH5002> said אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֖ה <WH3069> GOD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3069> God יַ֚עַן <WH3282> Because כִּ֤י <WH3588> for גָֽבְהוּ֙ <WH1361> are haughty בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> the daughters צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion וַתֵּלַ֙כְנָה֙ <WH1980> walking [נְטוֹּות כ] (נְטוּיֹ֣ות <WH5186> afternoon ק) גָּר֔וֹן <WH1627> necks וּֽמְשַׂקְּר֖וֹת <WH8265> and wanton עֵינָ֑יִם <WH5869> eyes הָל֤וֹךְ <WH1980> and go וְטָפֹף֙ <WH2952> and mincing תֵּלַ֔כְנָה <WH1980> and walk וּבְרַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7272> with their feet תְּעַכַּֽסְנָה׃ <WH5913> and making a tinkling

וְשִׂפַּ֣ח <WH5596> will smite with a scab אֲדֹנָ֔י <WH136> Therefore the Lord קָדְקֹ֖ד <WH6936> the crown of the head בְּנ֣וֹת <WH1323> of the daughters צִיּ֑וֹן <WH6726> of Zion וַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD פָּתְהֵ֥ן <WH6596> their secret parts יְעָרֶֽה׃ <WH6168> will discover ס

בַּיּ֨וֹם <WH3117> In that day הַה֜וּא <WH1931> he יָסִ֣יר <WH5493> will take away אֲדֹנָ֗י <WH136> the Lord אֵ֣ת <WH853> תִּפְאֶ֧רֶת <WH8597> the bravery הָעֲכָסִ֛ים <WH5914> of [their] tinkling ornaments וְהַשְּׁבִיסִ֖ים <WH7636> [about their feet] and [their] cauls וְהַשַּׂהֲרֹנִֽים׃ <WH7720> and [their] round tires like the moon
הַנְּטִיפ֥וֹת <WH5188> The chains וְהַשֵּׁיר֖וֹת <WH8285> and the bracelets וְהָֽרְעָלֽוֹת׃ <WH7479> and the mufflers

הַפְּאֵרִ֤ים <WH6287> The bonnets וְהַצְּעָדוֹת֙ <WH6807> and the ornaments of the legs וְהַקִּשֻּׁרִ֔ים <WH7196> and the headbands וּבָתֵּ֥י <WH1004> boxes הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> any וְהַלְּחָשִֽׁים׃ <WH3908> and the earrings
הַטַּבָּע֖וֹת <WH2885> The rings וְנִזְמֵ֥י <WH5141> jewels הָאָֽף׃ <WH639> and nose
הַמַּֽחֲלָצוֹת֙ <WH4254> The changeable suits of apparel וְהַמַּ֣עֲטָפ֔וֹת <WH4595> and the mantles וְהַמִּטְפָּח֖וֹת <WH4304> and the wimples וְהָחֲרִיטִֽים׃ <WH2754> and the crisping pins
וְהַגִּלְיֹנִים֙ <WH1549> The glasses וְהַסְּדִינִ֔ים <WH5466> and the fine linen וְהַצְּנִיפ֖וֹת <WH6797> and the hoods וְהָרְדִידִֽים׃ <WH7289> and the vails

וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> will come תַ֨חַת <WH8478> instead בֹּ֜שֶׂם <WH1314> And it shall come to pass [that] instead of sweet smell מַ֣ק <WH4716> there shall be stink יִֽהְיֶ֗ה <WH1961> will come וְתַ֨חַת <WH8478> Instead חֲגוֹרָ֤ה <WH2290> and instead of a girdle נִקְפָּה֙ <WH5364> a rent וְתַ֨חַת <WH8478> Instead מַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH4639> and instead of well set מִקְשֶׁה֙ <WH4748> hair קָרְחָ֔ה <WH7144> baldness וְתַ֥חַת <WH8478> Instead פְּתִיגִ֖יל <WH6614> and instead of a stomacher מַחֲגֹ֣רֶת <WH4228> a girding שָׂ֑ק <WH8242> of sackcloth כִּי־ <WH3587> [and] burning תַ֖חַת <WH8478> instead יֹֽפִי׃ <WH3308> instead of beauty
מְתַ֖יִךְ <WH4962> Thy men בַּחֶ֣רֶב <WH2719> by the sword יִפֹּ֑לוּ <WH5307> shall fall וּגְבוּרָתֵ֖ךְ <WH1369> and thy mighty בַּמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <WH4421> in the war

וְאָנ֥וּ <WH578> shall lament וְאָבְל֖וּ <WH56> and mourn פְּתָחֶ֑יהָ <WH6607> And her gates וְנִקָּ֖תָה <WH5352> and she [being] desolate לָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> upon the ground תֵּשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> shall sit
